Pages.Name: logic_playerproxy
Pages.Description: An entity that is used to relay inputs/ouputs to the player and back to the world.

Properties.Description: Name of the filter entity that controls which entities can damage us.
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.

InputOutputs.Name: SetDamageFilter
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the entity to use as damage filter. Pass in an empty string to clear the damage filter.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillConstrained
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity, all its children, and anything constrained to it, from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game. Parameter is the inflictor.

InputOutputs.Name: OnStartSlowingTime
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when a Portal player initiates slow time.

InputOutputs.Name: OnStopSlowingTime
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when a Portal player stops slowing time.

InputOutputs.Name: OnFlashlightOn
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the player turns on his flashlight. This output has the value of how much energy the player had when this happened [0..1].

InputOutputs.Name: OnFlashlightOff
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the player turns off his flashlight. This output has the value of how much energy the player had when this happened [0..1].

InputOutputs.Name: RequestPlayerHealth
InputOutputs.Description: Requests the current player's health from the proxy. This will fire the PlayerHealth output with the value.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerHealth
InputOutputs.Description: The player's current health value.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerMissedAR2AltFire
InputOutputs.Description: Player fired an AR2 combine ball that didn't kill any enemies.

InputOutputs.Name: SetFlashlightSlowDrain
InputOutputs.Description: Puts the player's flashlight in slow-power-drain mode (for Episodic darkness)

InputOutputs.Name: SetFlashlightNormalDrain
InputOutputs.Description: Puts the player's flashlight to default power drain

InputOutputs.Name: SetPlayerHealth
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the player's health to this value.

InputOutputs.Name: RequestAmmoState
InputOutputs.Description: Request the ammo state of the player. It will fire PlayerHasAmmo or PlayerHasNoAmmo outputs.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerHasAmmo
InputOutputs.Description: Fired by request if the player has any ammo.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerHasNoAmmo
InputOutputs.Description: Fired by request if the player doesn't have any ammo.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayerDied
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the player dies.

InputOutputs.Name: LowerWeapon
InputOutputs.Description: Lowers the players weapon.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableCappedPhysicsDamage
InputOutputs.Description: Cause player to take less damage from physics objects, and never more than 30 points from any individual strike.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableCappedPhysicsDamage
InputOutputs.Description: Undo effects of EnableCappedPhysicsDamage

InputOutputs.Name: SetLocatorTargetEntity
InputOutputs.Description: Set the entity that the HUD locator should track. (Usually a vehicle)
